title: Game telling me I have lost connection when my internet is fine?
body: It's not packet loss or anything... I just lose connection in loading screen and then ingame for no reason.

replies.body: Aye, even with good internet you can run into issues reaching specific servers.  For your specific issue, your connection might be having trouble getting to the game server, so it fails to reach the loading screen properly.  You'll want to go over the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot.  Let me know if you have any questions!
